top: United Airlines, which has a major hub at SFO, is planning to furlough more than 13,000 workers.

American Airlines and United Airlines say they will begin to furlough 32,000 employees after lawmakers and the White House failed to agree on a broad pandemic relief package that includes more federal aid for airlines.

American Airlines CEO Doug Parker said that if Washington comes up with a deal with $25 billion for airlines “over the next few days,” the company will reverse 19,000 furloughs set to begin Thursday and recall the workers.

United And American Airlines Tell 32,000: "It did not have to be this way."
"It is not what you all deserve."
Big SFO employer United to furlough 13,0: Despite the anticipated layoffs, United said this month it would increase flying in October to 40% of its 2019 schedule, up from 34% of pre-pandemic capacity in September.
Roland Li is a San Francisco Chronicle staff writer.
American, United to furlough 32,000 as t: They get bailed out over and over again,” Veronique de Rugy, a research fellow at George Mason University and columnist for a libertarian magazine, said in a recent interview.
Signs of a modest recovery faded this summer when COVID-19 cases spiked in many states.
